nodes.text: The Jewel of Yavin was an artifact that was stolen during the Galactic Civil War. Bialar Selis, an officer of the Bespin Wing Guard, led the investigation to find the stolen item.
According to concept artist Lee Sandales, the Jewel of Yavin was intended to be one of the treasures in the possession of Dryden Vos in the film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
